results.title: Introduction to the performing arts: opera with Henry Butler
results.creator_credit: Roger Englander, Robert Saudek, Learning Corporation of America and Robert Saudek Associates
results.brief_description: Henry Butler, stage director for the New York Metropolitan Opera Company, comments on the emotional inspiration for opera, famous opera houses, and trends in opera today. Includes interviews with the performers, and long extracts from performances of La Traviata and I Pagliacci.

results.title: Introduction to the end of an argument = Intifada - Speaking for Oneself, Speaking for Others
results.brief_description: This experimental documentary by Lebanese/Canadian artist, Jayce Salloum and New York based Palestinian filmmaker Elia Suleiman, deconstructs commonplace (mis)impressions of the Palestinian Intifada, an uprising understood primarily through Western media imagery. Drawing on Hollywood, European, and Israeli feature films, cartoons, documentaries, news coverage and excerpts of ‘live’ footage shot in the West Bank and Gaza strip, the film makes connections between media constructions of the Intifada and stereotypical visual representations of the Middle East, Arab culture, and the Palestinian people. Creating a collage that combines this diverse visual imagery with text, the documentary mimics the dominant media’s forms of representation, subverting its methodology and construction, in an attempt to to expose the racial biases concealed in familiar images. In doing so it goes beyond presenting a mere compendium of Arab stereotypes to demonstrate how repeated phrases and images contribute to the formation of US foreign policy on the Middle East region. In Arabic and English with English subtitles.

results.title: Introduction to the cathode ray oscilloscope
results.creator_credit: Thomas Smith and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: Illustrates the basic principles of the cathode-ray oscilloscope and its versatility as a tool in science and technology. Demonstrates the principles of transducer and their application through the use of the cathode ray oscilloscope.

results.title: Introduction to sound
results.brief_description: Gives examples of the diferent types of sound explaining how all such sounds are produced by a vibrating source. Explains the meaning of the terms oscillation, amplitude and frequency. Animated diagrams are used to show how the human vocal mechanism functions and models are used to demonstrate and explain the functioning of the human ear.

results.title: Introduction to preventive maintenance
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Automotive Operation and Maintenance”.
Shows the importance of preventive maintenance in truck operation and illustrates a typical preventive maintenance check as applied to the clutch pedal, the battery and the voltage regulator.

results.title: Introduction to prestressed concrete
results.brief_description: Prestressing, by the introduction of steel bars or cables under high tension into liquid concrete, has revolutionised concrete construction. Shows the difference between pre-tensioning and post-tensioning, and production techniques in the factory and on the site.
